bug.author: ShomyLiu
bug.description: Hi, After checking that the max_len of all sentences in the GIDS dataset is 100, however, there are some values in SubPos and ObjPos larger than 100 So it seems that the max_len 100 is the length after preprocessing instead of the real max length of the sentences, is it? Thanks

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ShomyLiu>@ShomyLiu</denchmark-link> , Yes, that is true based on the distribution of length of sentences in GIDS dataset, we decided to fix max_len to 100. Taking real max length would require a lot of padding and thus things will not fit in GPU memory. Majority of sentences have less than 100 words so this decision doesn't affect the performance much.
